title: Main
content:
[!-- This image acts as a thumbnail.  --]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/main/logo_250.png width="0" height="0"]]

[[include fragment:front-page-gridcode]]

[!-- THIS IS THE HEADER: IT HAS THE CLASSIFIED HEADER, THE CONTEST BANNER, AND THE SURVEY LINK. PLEASE USE THE APPROPRIATE TOGGLES: classified, contest, and survey and surveylink. THE CLASSIFIED HEADER AND CONTEST BANNER SHOULD NOT BE ON AT THE SAME TIME, BUT THE SURVEY CAN COEXIST WITH EITHER. --]

[[include :scp-wiki:fragment:front-page-header
classified=--]
]]

[[div class="grid"]]

[[include fragment:front-page-news-bulletin
|date1=April 1st
|blurb1=This month's site news announces the winners of Public Domain con, two new canons, and this year's April Fools gimmick! Read it [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/news-04-2025 here!]

------

Want to know how front-page writing features are selected? Click on the "Archived Features" links for more information!
]]

[[include fragment:front-page-features
[!-- SCP FEATURE --]
|scpslug=https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8891 
|scptitle=SCP-8891: Nervous Tick 
[!-- ADD A SPACE AT THE END OF THE AUTHOR(S) --]
|scpby=[[user Anorrack]] and [[user Tsercele]] 
|scpselector=Anorrack (Public Domain Contest first place team)
|scpblurb=Documented side effects include: relapse of prior symptoms, implant rejection, bacterial infection, [18 ENTRIES OMITTED FOR BREVITY], stroke, seizures, paralysis, coma, and death. 

[!-- TALE FEATURE --]
|taleslug=https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/fear-of-sleep 
|taletitle=Fear of Sleep 
[!-- ADD A SPACE AT THE END OF THE AUTHOR(S) --]
|taleby=[[user TyGently]] 
|taleselector=TyGently (Public Domain Contest first place team)
|taleblurb=As Three Portlands disintegrates, a desperate group of survivors try to save the population, while dark forces convene to stop them. An all-new installment of Comedown Machine. 

[!-- GOI FORMAT FEATURE --]
|goislug=https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/red-queen-s-race 
|goititle=RED QUEEN'S RACE 
[!-- ADD A SPACE AT THE END OF THE AUTHOR(S) --]
|goiby=[[user Intercedent]] 
|goiselector=Intercedent (Public Domain Contest first place team)
|goiblurb=The Foundation, the Insurgency, the Global Occult Coalition, and the US Federal Government go to war. Battle lines are drawn. Shallow caches are unearthed. Enmities centuries in the making bare envenomed teeth. The world hangs in the balance. Just as planned. 

[!-- REVIEWER'S SPOTLIGHT --]
|rsslug=https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/for-brandon 
|rstitle=for Brandon 
[!-- ADD A SPACE AT THE END OF THE AUTHOR(S) --]
|rsby=[[user TheChunk]] 
|rsselector=Jezixo 
|rsblurb=I skipped work today, Brandon. Can you believe it? 
]]

[[include fragment:front-page-artist-showcase
|artblurb=Alexander245, Kikunai, Diogene_s

[!-- SLIDESHOW IMAGE URLS. IF IT'S ONLY ONE IMAGE STICK IT IN ALL THREE--]

|art1url= https://i.imgur.com/7eW3I8Z.png

|art2url= https://i.imgur.com/gOcz6vU.jpg

|art3url= https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/art:dio-s-public-domain-fanart-doodles/PDCON-SPRING-HEELED-JACK.jpeg/medium.jpg ]]

[[/div]]

~~~~
----
[[include :scp-wiki:fragment:wl-front-page-box |css=--]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:fragment:wl-front-page-box |div=--]
|URL=https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/
|URL-Title=Wanderers' Library
|img-URL=https://wanderers-library.wdfiles.com/local--files/component%3Atheme/wl_logo.png
|top-h4=Official Sister Site
|top-h2=The Wanderer's Library
|text=The Wanderer's Library features the endless fantastical stories contained within the Library, home to the Serpent's Hand and readers of all shapes and sizes. Stories should inspire Wonder - a sense that there is a larger world beyond the one we know.
]]
[[include :scp-wiki:fragment:front-page-international-branches]]
